channel.title: I can't do anything! Please help me!
channel.description: I know that if I read the Rules carefully I would know about this, but I want to play Moparscape as fast as possible. When I log into my own server, I can't open anything e.g. doors, gates etc. I also can't talk to anyone, I can only move, and do VERY basic things. Can someone please tell me what I need to do? I would really appreciate it. Thanks!
